英文法規名稱: Charge Standards of Cleaning and Maintenance Fee for the Scenic Areas Managed by the East Coast National Scenic Area Administration, Tourism Bureau, Ministry of Transportation and Communications
中文法規名稱: 交通部觀光署東部海岸國家風景區管理處所屬景區入園清潔維護費收費標準
沿革內容:
1.Promulgated on Nov. 1st, 2013.
2.Amended on Dec. 28, 2017
3.Amended on May 18, 2018

法規內容.條文內容: These Standards are enacted in accordance with Subparagraph 2, Paragraph 1, Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.
The scenic spots within the jurisdiction of this Administration for which entry fees are charged, and the fee standards, are shown in the attached chart.

These Standards become effective on Nov. 1, 2013.Fees for the Shitiping Scenic Area will be collected beginning June 30, 2014.
These standards have been revised per the second schedule of amendments as of December 28, 2017. The revised standards will become effective on December 30, 2017.
